articles.title: Hubble finds evidence for rare black hole in Omega Centauri - Phys.org
articles.description: An international team of astronomers has used more than 500 images from the NASA/ESA Hubble Space Telescope spanning two decades to detect seven fast-moving stars in the innermost region of Omega Centauri, the largest and brightest globular cluster in the sky…
